Deprecated Visualization Functions

deprecated-viz.Rd

These functions have been renamed to use the viz_* prefix for clarity. Please use the new names:

  • create_histogram() â†’ viz_histogram()

  • create_bar() â†’ viz_bar()

  • create_stackedbar() â†’ viz_stackedbar()

  • create_stackedbars() â†’ viz_stackedbars()

  • create_timeline() â†’ viz_timeline()

  • create_heatmap() â†’ viz_heatmap()

  • create_scatter() â†’ viz_scatter()

  • create_map() â†’ viz_map()

  • create_treemap() â†’ viz_treemap()

The old names will continue to work but are deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

Usage

create_histogram(...)

create_bar(...)

create_stackedbar(...)

create_stackedbars(...)

create_timeline(...)

create_heatmap(...)

create_scatter(...)

create_map(...)

create_treemap(...)
